retrieved_chunks.title: AlphaWave  Production AI, RAG Assistants & Edge Intelligence (chunk 22)
AlphaWave  Production AI, RAG Assistants & Edge Intelligence (chunk 4)
AlphaWave  Production AI, RAG Assistants & Edge Intelligence (chunk 5)

answer: AlphaWave is an IT company focusing on local AI development, advanced frontend and backend solutions, 3D web experiences, cloud systems, and custom digital products. They specialize in creating fast, secure, scalable, and future-ready applications tailored to their clients' needs. AlphaWave also develops privacy-focused local LLM-powered chatbots where your data remains on your system. Their services include projects like the UNIRI Sports center AI Assistant and they offer contact options via email, phone, or WhatsApp for more information.
